field.label: PID File
field.help: The PID file of the process.

field.label: Match
field.help:
Find the process by regular expression. Test your pattern with
monit procmatch PATTERN

field.label: Path
field.help: According to the service type path can be a file or a directory.

field.label: Program Timeout
field.help: The timeout for custom program checks.

field.label: Address
field.help: The target IP address for 'Remote Host' and 'Network' checks.

field.label: Start
field.help: The start script of the service.

field.label: Stop
field.help: The stop script of the service.

field.label: Tests
field.help: This is a list with service tests.

field.label: Depends
field.help: Optionally define a (list of) service(s) which are required before monitoring this one, if any of the dependencies are either stopped or unmonitored this service will stop/unmonitor too.

field.label: Poll Time
field.help: Set the service poll time. Either as a number of cycles "NUMBER CYCLES" or Cron-style "* 8-19 * * 1-5"
